steps.description: Name Asset category. You can create categories based on Asset Types like Furniture, Property, Electronics etc.
steps.label: Asset Category Name
steps.title: Asset Category Name

steps.description: Check to enable Capital Work in Progress accounting
steps.label: Enable Capital Work in Progress Accounting
steps.title: Enable CWIP Accounting

steps.description: Add a row to define Depreciation Method and other details. Note that you can leave Finance Book blank to have it's accounting done in the primary books of accounts.
steps.label: Finance Books
steps.title: Finance Book Detail

steps.description: Select the Fixed Asset and Depreciation accounts applicable for this Asset Category type
steps.label: Accounts
steps.title: Accounts
